content: hello - I have an api portal with some send endpoints for STEVE. I can make you an API user if you're interested so that you can obtain tokens and see endpoints. I'll be working on subscription based receiving data - webhook and sqs.
Could we maybe get some user credentials in here? It's a sandbox area so it's fine that it's on this public/private space right?
for everyone working with this -- I fixed the issue with the send endpoints -- I mistakenly put the endpoint in lowercase on the API portal. the endpoints will show correctly now

The new route NCHS-FHIR-Test-Validate will perform a validation before sending to NCHS. find the path to POST to in the api portal and see documentation here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1afSRiZnvKy1ke4BSaUOzzleEkIEx4ha0lVY2J0touq4/edit
